app_descript:
OWise Breast Cancer Support: Regain Control of Your Health Journey

OWise is a multi-award-winning health app designed to empower individuals facing a breast cancer diagnosis. From the very first day, OWise provides personalized, safe, and credible information, along with practical support and guidance, all easily accessible in one convenient location.

ğŸ“Œ Core Features:

  • Personalized Insights: Access tailored reports and track over 30 different side effects related to treatments like chemotherapy and hormone therapy. ğŸ“Š

  • Enhanced Communication: Share your tracked symptoms with healthcare professionals or loved ones to foster better understanding. ğŸ’¬
  • Credible Resources: Understand your diagnosis with credible, evidence-based content to engage in informed discussions with your doctor. ğŸ“š
  • Privacy and Safety: Your user data is safeguarded and anonymized, adhering to GDPR regulations. ğŸ”’
